description:
The DeepWater Digital is a precision dual-axis tiltmeter designed for underwater measurements and applications under high external pressure.  The housing is machined from a solid block of 316 stainless steel and incorporates a high-pressure, underwater mateable neoprene connector.  Inside are one (uniaxial version) or two (biaxial version) gravity-referenced electrolytic tilt sensors and our low-noise electronics, delivering precision, high dynamic range and long-term stability under the most demanding conditions.  

DeepWater tiltmeters are excellent choices for offshore applications and for monitoring dams, pipelines and underwater machinery.  DeepWater tiltmeters are also available with 4-20 mA and analog voltage outputs.
